## PickThisActions type

\*

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type PickThisActions<T> = {
    [K in Exclude<keyof T, 'moduleName' | 'state' | 'onActive' | 'onInactive' | 'onMount'>]: HandlerToAction<T[K]>;
};
```
